name: ormEvictEntity
description: This will remove all the entries for the specified component name from the entity cache.

params.name: entityName
params.description: Entity name of the persistent CFC

params.name: primaryKey
params.description: Primary key value of the component

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: To evict all the cache data of CArtist entity

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: To evict the cache data of CArtists entity whose primary key is 1
